metadata.title: CVE-2017-2807 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the tag parsingfunctionality of Ledger-CLI 3.1.1. A specially crafted journal file cancause an integer underflow resulting in code execution. An attacker canconstruct a malicious journal file to trigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2807` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ledger - 3.1.2+dfsg1-1
python3-ledger - 3.1.2+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ledger package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2+dfsg1-1').
